archimate:Requirement.name: R7.6 Communication material on the baseline created for each defined service type that would implement the baseline
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U1 As a service owner/architect/platform owner/S&C product development I want to be aware of the controls in the baseline that are relevant to me so that I can show my service is security baseline/model compliant U17 As Security Baseline Owner I need an easy way of communincating security controls to the different types of stakeholders to enable efficient communication and reduce the time it takes to get controls implemented
